Rank.Description: Increases the damage of your Primal Strike by 5%.
Increases the damage of your Primal Strike by 10%.
Increases the damage of your Primal Strike by 15%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 2%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 4%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 6%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 8%.
Increases your Attack Power and Weapon Damage by 10%.

Increases the damage of your Combo Point generating abilities by 4%.
Increases the damage of your Combo Point generating abilities by 6%.
Increases the damage of your Combo Point generating abilities by 8%.

Increases the damage of your Finishers by 4%.
Increases the damage of your Finishers by 6%.

Ability.Description: Deals 146 to 162 Death damage and applies State of Sloth to the enemy, reducing movement speed by 30% for 6s. Awards 1 Combo Point.

Rank.Description: Increases the damage of your non-physical attacks by 2%.
Increases the damage of your non-physical attacks by 4%.
Increases the damage of your non-physical attacks by 6%.
Reduces the damage you take from Fire and Death attacks by 2% and increases the damage of your attacks by 2%.
Reduces the damage you take from Fire and Death attacks by 4% and increases the damage of your attacks by 4%.
Reduces the damage you take from Fire and Death attacks by 6% and increases the damage of your attacks by 6%.
Enemies affected by State of Sloth take 10% more damage from the Rogue.

Ability.Description:
Deals additional Fire damage per Combo Point.
1 Point: 177 damage 2 Points: 225 damage 3 Points: 286 damage 4 Points: 354 damage 5 Points: 434 damage

Rank.Description: Your Hellfire Blades and Smoldering Blades buff you for 15 seconds when they proc, increasing your damage by 3%.
Your Hellfire Blades and Smoldering Blades buff you for 15 seconds when they proc, increasing your damage by 5%.
Increases the damage of Dusk Strike and Twilight Force by 5%. Reduces the Energy cost of Primal Strike by 1.
Increases the damage of Dusk Strike and Twilight Force by 10%. Reduces the Energy cost of Primal Strike by 2.

Ability.Description: Dusk Strike and Twilight Force do not cost energy. Lasts 15s.

Rank.Description: If the enemy is suffering from the effect of Fiery Spike, your Blazing Strike and Flame Thrust have a 6.6% chance per Combo Point to cast Fiery Spike onto them and generate an extra Combo Point.
If the enemy is suffering from the effect of Fiery Spike, your Blazing Strike and Flame Thrust have a 13.2% chance per Combo Point to cast Fiery Spike onto them and generate an extra Combo Point.
If the enemy is suffering from the effect of Fiery Spike, your Blazing Strike and Flame Thrust have a 20% chance per Combo Point to cast Fiery Spike onto them and generate an extra Combo Point.

Ability.Description: Deals 405 to 448 Death damage and casts Fiery Spike onto the target. Awards 3 Combo Points.

Rank.Description: Increases the damage from your weapon enchantments by 25%.
Increases the damage from your weapon enchantments by 50%.
Increases the damage from your weapon enchantments by 75%.

You have a 33% chance to retain heat for 30 seconds each time a damaging ability that generates Combo Points is used, increasing damage done by 2%. When this effect is applied 5 times, your next Finisher deals 30% more damage and removes the effect.

You have a 66% chance to retain heat for 30 seconds each time a damaging ability that generates Combo Points is used, increasing damage done by 2%. When this effect is applied 5 times, your next Finisher deals 30% more damage and removes the effect.

You have a 100% chance to retain heat for 30 seconds each time a damaging ability that generates Combo Points is used, increasing damage done by 2%. When this effect is applied 5 times, your next Finisher deals 30% more damage and removes the effect.
Your Blazing Strike, Flame Thrust, Dusk Strike and Twilight Force deal 2% more damage and an additional 10% more damage if the enemy's health is below 30%.
Your Blazing Strike, Flame Thrust, Dusk Strike and Twilight Force deal 4% more damage and an additional 20% more damage if the enemy's health is below 30%.
Your Blazing Strike, Flame Thrust, Dusk Strike and Twilight Force deal 6% more damage and an additional 30% more damage if the enemy's health is below 30%.

Ability.Description:
Causes the next 10 weapon attacks to deal additional Death damage per Combo Point.
1 Point: 139 damage 2 Points: 142 damage 3 Points: 148 damage 4 Points: 156 damage 5 Points: 164 damage

Rank.Description: Increases the maximum stack size of Fiery Spike by 1. Increases the damage of Fiery Spike by 15%.
Increases the maximum stack size of Fiery Spike by 2. Increases the damage of Fiery Spike by 30%.

Ability.Description: Roots and deals 885 Death damage over 4s. Applies Nightrage to the Rogue, increasing damage done by Blazing Strike and Flame Thrust by 15% for 60s. Awards 2 Combo Points.

Rank.Description: Your Blazing Strike, Flame Thrust and Flame Blitz cause the enemy to burn for additional Fire damage equal to 100% of your weapon damage over 4s.
Your Blazing Strike, Flame Thrust and Flame Blitz cause the enemy to burn for additional Fire damage equal to 200% of your weapon damage over 4s.

Ability.Description: Deals 228 to 252 Death damage. Increases the Rogue's damage done by 20% for 8s. Awards 2 Combo Points.

Rank.Description: Increases the number of charges of Scourge of Darkness by 3.
Increases the number of charges of Scourge of Darkness by 6.
Increases the number of charges of Scourge of Darkness by 9.
Increases the number of charges of Scourge of Darkness by 12.
Increases the number of charges of Scourge of Darkness by 15.
Your non-Physical attacks ignore 5% of the enemy's resistance.
Your non-Physical attacks ignore 10% of the enemy's resistance.
Your non-Physical attacks ignore 15% of the enemy's resistance.

Ability.Description:
Deals additional Fire damage per Combo Point to up to 5 enemies. If the targeted enemy is affected by the Rogue’s Fiery Spike, applies Fiery Spike to all enemies hit.
